Simple, Transparent Pricing

Month-to-month. No long-term contracts. Cancel anytime with 30 days notice.

Individual Business

$149/month + $99 setup fee

What you get:

Monthly content updates: 3-5 new Q&As targeting trending traveler queries (e.g., "Best boutique wineries Barossa for organic shiraz tastings under $50")

Honest positioning workshop: Initial 90-minute session to articulate what you actually are (not aspirational claims)

Weekly AI monitoring: Testing across ChatGPT, Claude, Perplexity, Grok to track mention rates

Partner reference integration: We identify and reference complementary businesses in your content

Monthly performance report: AI mention frequency, platform breakdown, trending queries, recommendations

Best for: Single businesses starting with AI optimization

Network Partnership

$99/month per business (min 3)

No setup fee

Everything in Individual, plus:

Monthly coordination calls: 45-minute Zoom aligning promotions across partners (winery + restaurant + hotel campaigns)

Cross-referral tracking: Monitor which partners generate bookings for each other

Seasonal campaign coordination: Plan and execute joint promotions (e.g., "Barossa Wine + Dine Weekend," "Spring Release Tours")

Quarterly strategy sessions: Full network meeting to review performance and plan next quarter

Partner recruitment assistance: We help identify and onboard new partners to expand your network

Best for: Multiple businesses in same region coordinating together

Referral discount: Refer a partner, get 10% off per referral (up to 30% off)

Get started →

What's Included in Both Plans

/ai directory creation: Structured Q&A content formatted for AI consumption

llms.txt setup: Roadmap file pointing AI systems to your content

Basic content discovery: Ensuring AI crawlers can find your content (robots.txt, sitemap)

Email support: Questions answered within 24 hours

Content ownership: You own all content we create

What Results Should You Expect?

We're honest about realistic outcomes:

AI mention rates: Typical increase from baseline (often 10-20% of relevant queries) to 40-70% depending on business quality, regional competition, and network participation.

Network referral bookings: Partners typically see meaningful booking increases from cross-referrals when relationships are genuine and tracked.

SEO improvement: Cross-linking from network partners typically improves Google rankings for regional search terms.

Timeline: Initial AI indexing takes 30-60 days. Best results after 6+ months as content builds and network effects compound.

Important: Results vary based on your business quality (reviews matter), regional competition, honest positioning, and commitment to the network. AI recommendations are probabilistic, not guaranteed.

When You Shouldn't Hire Us

We're selective about clients. Not a good fit if:

Reviews below 3.5 stars: Fix quality issues first. AI optimization exposes problems faster.

Can't commit 6+ months: Results show best after 6-12 months as network effects compound.

Not ready for honest positioning: If you insist on claiming "boutique premium unique" when you're actually a large commercial operation, we'll clash.

Want overnight results: AI indexing takes 30-60 days minimum. Realistic expectations matter.

Payment & Cancellation

Payment methods: Credit card or direct debit, processed monthly

Cancellation policy: Month-to-month service. Cancel anytime with 30 days notice. No penalties.

Setup fee: Individual plan only ($99). Covers initial positioning workshop, /ai directory creation, technical setup. Non-refundable as work is completed.

90-day guarantee: If you don't see measurable improvements in AI mentions, positioning, or traffic within 90 days, we either continue working free until you do, or refund monthly service fees (you choose). Setup fees non-refundable.

Frequently Asked Questions

Can I start Individual and upgrade to Network later?

Yes. We'll waive the setup fee if you upgrade within 90 days and recruit at least 2 partners.

What if I already have an llms.txt file?

Great! We'll show you what it's missing and integrate it into our system. Many clients start with basic llms.txt.

How much of my time is required?

Initial: 2-3 hours (positioning workshop, providing business info). Monthly: 30 minutes for check-in. Network clients add 45 minutes monthly for coordination calls.

Do you guarantee specific booking increases?

No. We provide realistic ranges based on similar businesses, but results depend on your business quality, competition, and how well you execute on honest positioning.

What platforms do you monitor?

ChatGPT, Claude, Perplexity, Grok. We test weekly with 10+ query variations and report monthly on mention rates.
